name: S P A C E S O N G
name_original: S P A C E S O N G
description:
This piece of software is a playground for experiencing  space through keyboard interaction. You control the universe now. Try to make everything move. The poem will help you in your discovery.

Made for Global Game Jam 2020 as a part of Finnish Game Jam
by psychedelia and Taikamtesa.

GGJ submission can be found here.
